features.title: Everything You Need to Sell Gift Vouchers Online
features.text: Everything below is included as standard. No hidden costs, no complex setup, no ongoing fees—just a complete system that generates revenue automatically.

items.title: Instant Email Delivery
items.text: Vouchers delivered to recipients' inboxes within seconds of purchase. Perfect for last-minute gifts—no printing, no posting, no waiting. Customers get instant gratification, you get instant revenue.

items.title: Fully Branded & Customizable
items.text: Your logo, colors, and design on every voucher. Looks professional, builds trust, reinforces your brand. Complete control over appearance—these are your vouchers, not generic templates.

items.title: Monetary & Treatment-Based Vouchers
items.text: Sell flexible £50/£100 vouchers or specific treatments like "90-Minute Thai Massage" or "Couples Spa Package." Give customers choice while showcasing your signature services beautifully.

items.title: Automatic Expiry & Fraud Protection
items.text: System tracks every voucher's expiry date, redemption status, and unique code automatically. Prevents duplicates, blocks expired vouchers, eliminates fraud—complete security without manual checking.

items.title: Part Redemption for Multiple Visits
items.text: Customers can use a £100 voucher across multiple appointments—£40 today, £60 next month. Encourages return visits, builds loyalty, increases lifetime value without complicated tracking.

items.title: QR Code Quick Redemption
items.text: Staff scan QR codes with any smartphone to redeem vouchers instantly. No typing codes, no manual lookups, no errors. Fast, simple, foolproof redemption every single time.
